title: Fix FSSAI spelling in top header/hero line

requirements.text: Find and correct any misspelling of 'FSSAI' in the topmost visible line of the page — this includes the Header component, HeroSection component, and any marquee/banner text — ensuring it reads exactly 'FSSAI' everywhere in that area.

quotes: there is a spelling mistake in the top line. FSSAI SPELLING

acceptanceCriteria: The topmost line visible on page load (Header/HeroSection) contains no misspelling of FSSAI (e.g., no 'FASSAI', 'FSAAI', 'FSSAI ' with extra spaces, or similar typos).
The corrected text reads exactly 'FSSAI' in all occurrences within the header/hero area.
No other text on the page is inadvertently changed.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Only fix the spelling — do not alter layout, styling, or other content.
nonGoals: Changing FSSAI references elsewhere on the page (ServicesSection, ContactSection, Footer) unless they are also misspelled.
Any new feature additions or design changes.
